00040         symbol_t uid;      
00041         bool global;       
00042         expression_t expr;

00049     struct state_t {
00050         symbol_t uid;           
00051         expression_t invariant; 
00052         int32_t locNr;          
00053     };

00060     struct transition_t {
00061         int nr;                 
00062         state_t *src;           
00063         state_t *dst;           
00064         expression_t guard;             
00065         expression_t assign;    
00066         expression_t sync;              
00067     };

00074     struct function_t
00075     {
00076         symbol_t uid;                
00077         bool global;                 
00078         std::set<symbol_t> changes;  
00079         BlockStatement *body;        
00080         function_t() : body(NULL) {}
00081         ~function_t();
00082     };

00084     struct template_t;
00085         
00086     struct instance_t {
00087         symbol_t uid;
00088         const template_t *templ;
00089         std::map<symbol_t, expression_t> mapping;
00090     };

00096     struct declarations_t 
00097     {
00098         frame_t frame;
00099         std::list<variable_t> variables;        
00100         std::list<function_t> functions;        
00101         std::list<instance_t> instances;        
00102         std::list<state_t> states;              
00103         std::list<transition_t> transitions;    
00104     };
00105 
00109     struct template_t : public declarations_t
00110     {
00111         symbol_t uid;                           
00112         int32_t nr;                             
00113         symbol_t init;                          
00114         frame_t parameters;                     
00115     };
00116 
00122     struct process_t : public instance_t 
00123     {
00124         int32_t nr;             
00125     };

00129     class SystemVisitor
00130     {
00131     public:
00132         virtual ~SystemVisitor() {}
00133         virtual void visitSystemBefore(TimedAutomataSystem *) {}
00134         virtual void visitSystemAfter(TimedAutomataSystem *) {}
00135         virtual void visitVariable(variable_t &) {}
00136         virtual bool visitTemplateBefore(template_t &) { return true; }
00137         virtual void visitTemplateAfter(template_t &) {}
00138         virtual void visitState(state_t &) {}
00139         virtual void visitTransition(transition_t &) {}
00140         virtual void visitInstance(instance_t &) {}
00141         virtual void visitProcess(process_t &) {}
00142         virtual void visitFunction(function_t &) {}
00143     };

00213         // The list of templates.
00214         std::list<template_t> templates;
00215

00217         std::list<instance_t> instances;
00218         
00219         // List of processes used in the system line
00220         std::list<process_t> processes;
00221 
00222         // The set of all constants
00223         std::set<symbol_t> constants;

00225         // Maps constans to their values

00229         declarations_t global;
00230 
00231         // The current declaration block
00232         declarations_t *current;
00233     };

00261         virtual void visitTemplateAfter(template_t &);
